data.question: What is the empirical formula of MOF-5?
At what temperature was the crystal data for mof-5_m_int_300c collected?
What crystal system does mof-5_m_int_rt belong to?
Is the space group for mof-5_m_int_300c and mof-5_m_int_rt the same?
data.answer: Yes, both have the space group R -3 m

data.question: What is the wavelength used for the structure refinement of mof-5_m_int_rt?
How many unique reflections were collected for mof-5_m_int_300c?
What is the calculated density of mof-5_m_int_rt?
Does the crystal size of mof-5_m_int_300c and mof-5_m_int_rt differ?
data.answer: No, both have a crystal size of 0.10 x 0.10 x 0.10 mm

data.question: What is the final R index (I>2sigma(I)) for mof-5_m_int_300c?
Is the absorption coefficient for mof-5_m_int_rt higher than that of mof-5_m_int_300c?
data.answer: Yes, mof-5_m_int_rt has 1.158 mm^-1 and mof-5_m_int_300c has 1.151 mm^-1

data.question: What is the theta range for data collection of mof-5_m_int_rt?
Does mof-5_m_int_300c have a higher volume than mof-5_m_int_rt?
data.answer: Yes, mof-5_m_int_300c has a volume of 13249(6) A^3

data.question: What is the goodness-of-fit on F^2 for mof-5_m_int_rt?
Are the unit cell dimensions for mof-5_m_int_300c larger than those for mof-5_m_int_rt?
data.answer: Yes, mof-5_m_int_300c has larger unit cell dimensions

data.question: What is the largest diff. peak and hole for mof-5_m_int_rt?
Is the absorption correction method for mof-5_m_int_300c empirical?
What is the space group of mof-5_m_int_300c?
Does mof-5_m_int_rt have a higher calculated density than mof-5_m_int_300c?
data.answer: Yes, mof-5_m_int_rt has a higher calculated density

data.question: What is the formula weight of MOF-5?
Is the crystal system for mof-5_m_int_300c trigonal?
